name: easy-ocr
title: Easy OCR
description: Use Tesseract OCR to extract text from screenshot
author: Rafo94

commands.name: index
commands.title: Area OCR
commands.description: Select screen area which you want to extract the text

preferences.name: tesseract_path
preferences.title: Tesseract binary path
preferences.description: Absolute path to your tesseract binary - check documentation if default path is not correct

preferences.name: autodetect_lang
preferences.title: Autodetect language
preferences.label: Enable language autodetect
preferences.description: Enable auto detection fo language, Tesseract language will be used as a fallback language if autodetect fails or doesn't find suitable lang

preferences.name: tesseract_lang
preferences.title: Tesseract language
preferences.description: Language which will be used for OCR. Run tesseract --list-langs in your terminal for list of available languages.

preferences.name: newLine
preferences.title: How to treat new lines (\n)?
preferences.description: OCR engines can read new lines and they interpret them as \n, this option gives you ability to swap them out
